Authors:
sadiq ullah, MEHARDAD Abbasi, Mary Catherine Aime, AAMNA
ISHAQ, Abdul Nasir Khalid, Muhammad Fiaz
Title: Allodus prostii comb. nov., causal agent of tulip rust
Keywords:
autoecious rust fungi , fungal taxonomy, Pucciniales, rDNA
sequences, Shangla, Uredinales
Abstract:
During surveys of the rust fungal flora in Pakistan,
samples of Puccinia prostii infecting Tulipa clusiana were made. Our
phylogenetic and morphological analyses show that this species is
congeneric with other members of Allodus. On the basis of these results
the new combination, Allodus prostii is proposed and the species is
fully described and illustrated.
